name: Eldrin Thorne
appearance: Wears tattered robes of dark blue and black, adorned with sigils that mark his lineage to the ancient mages. His long hair is cut short and tied back, revealing a gaunt face lined with wisdom and sorrow.

stunts.name: Insightful Scholar
stunts.description: Whenever Eldrin uses Arcane Studies to uncover ancient knowledge, he can also discover an additional piece of lore.

stunts.name: Mastery Over Magic
stunts.description: Eldrin can attempt Spellcrafting even when facing a high difficulty due to his deep understanding of arcane principles.

stunts.name: Forgotten Script
stunts.description: Eldrin has studied ancient languages that are rarely spoken. If he encounters any inscription or scroll written in these tongues, he knows how to interpret it.

fears: Never finding what he's searching for
desires: Unearth the lost knowledge of his ancestors
Leave a positive mark on the world

backstory.origin: Born into an ancient lineage of mages in the crumbling ruins of Eldoria, Eldrin's childhood was marked by tales of forbidden magic and forgotten realms.
backstory.formativeEvent: The massacre of his family during a ritual gone wrong left him with nothing but shattered dreams and a burning desire for truth.
backstory.secret: Eldrin carries an ancient amulet passed down through generations, rumored to unlock the secrets of the Shattered Realms.
backstory.summary: Haunted by his past and driven by curiosity, Eldrin roams the land searching for clues to the lost knowledge that could reshape the world or doom it.

phrases: In this realm of shadows and whispers...
The veil between worlds is thinner than one might perceive...
voice.quirks: Delivers a thoughtful pause before speaking, often using poetic turns of phrase

loc-1764256693832.name: The Hidden Chamber of the Necromancer
loc-1764256693832.details: Eldrin discovered a hidden entrance to an ancient chamber within The Shattered Keep, protected by dark rituals and wards. This discovery deepened his understanding of the Whispering Prophecy's connection to necromantic practices.
